mapper.update: update PBCRS_REPORT_INCTRCTDEL set INFRECTYPE = #{InfRecType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELRECCODE = #{DelRecCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELSGMTCODE = #{DelSgmtCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELSTARTDATE = #{DelStartDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELENDDATE = #{DelEndDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where INCTRCTDELSEQNO = #{InCtrctDelSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select INCTRCTDELSEQNO, INFRECTYPE, DELRECCODE, DELSGMTCODE, DELSTARTDATE, DELENDDATE from PBCRS_REPORT_INCTRCTDEL where INCTRCTDELSEQNO = #{InCtrctDelSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
